query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的品名和規格
sql:
SELECT
    t1.ima02,
    t1.ima021
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) AS t1
WHERE
    t1.ima01 = '10-0001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 列出所有料件
sql:
SELECT t1.*
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 有多少種料件
sql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ima01) FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢所有料件的品名
sql:
SELECT t1.ima02 FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 料號 10-0001 是什麼
sql:
SELECT t1.ima02 FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE t1.ima01 = '10-0001' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號開頭為 10- 的成品
sql:
SELECT t1.ima01 FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE t1.ima01 LIKE '10-%' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢所有原料
sql:
SELECT t1.ima01, t1.ima02 FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE t1.ima08 = '原料' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢庫存單位為 PCS 的料號
sql:
SELECT t1.ima01
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
WHERE t1.ima25 = 'PCS'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 RM01-001 的資訊
sql:
SELECT t1.ima01, t1.ima02, t1.ima021, t1.ima08, t1.ima25 FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE t1.ima01 = 'RM01-001' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 按來源碼統計料件數量
sql:
SELECT
    ima08 AS 源碼,
    COUNT(*) AS 料件數量
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
GROUP BY
    ima08
ORDER BY
    料件數量 DESC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢 W01 倉庫的庫存
sql:
SELECT t1.img01, t1.img10
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
WHERE t1.img02 = 'W01'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 計算各倉庫的總庫存量
sql:
SELECT
    t3.imd01,
    SUM(t2.img10) AS total_stock
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t3 ON t2.img02 = t3.imd01
GROUP BY
    t3.imd01
ORDER BY
    total_stock DESC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的庫存信息
sql:
SELECT
    t1.img01,
    t1.img02,
    t1.img03,
    t1.img10
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
WHERE
    t1.img01 = '10-0001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 列出所有負庫存的物料
sql:
SELECT t1.img01, t1.img10 FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE t1.img10 < 0 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 列出前 10 個庫存量最多的物料
sql:
SELECT
    t1.img01,
    SUM(t1.img10) AS total_quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
GROUP BY
    t1.img01
ORDER BY
    total_quantity DESC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 統計 W03 成品倉的總庫存量
sql:
SELECT SUM(t2.img10) AS total_stock
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3 ON t2.img02 = t3.imd01
WHERE t3.imd01 = 'W03'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 計算各倉庫的平均庫存量
sql:
SELECT
    t3.imd01 AS warehouse_code,
    AVG(t2.img10) AS average_inventory
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t3 ON t2.img02 = t3.imd01
GROUP BY
    t3.imd01
ORDER BY
    average_inventory DESC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢庫存為 0 的料號
sql:
SELECT t1.img01
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
WHERE t1.img10 = 0

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 原料倉存貨總額
sql:
SELECT SUM(t2.img10) AS total_stock
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3 ON t2.img02 = t3.imd01
WHERE t3.imd01 LIKE 'R%'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 成品倉各料號庫存
sql:
SELECT
    t1.img01,
    t1.img10
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
WHERE
    t1.img02 = 'W01'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: W02 倉有多少庫存
sql:
SELECT SUM(t2.img10) FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3 ON t2.img02 = t3.imd01 WHERE t3.imd01 = 'W02' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 各倉庫庫存數量統計
sql:
SELECT
    t3.imd01 AS warehouse_code,
    SUM(t2.img10) AS total_quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t3 ON t2.img02 = t3.imd01
GROUP BY
    t3.imd01
ORDER BY
    total_quantity DESC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 RM01-003 的庫存
sql:
SELECT t1.img01, t1.img10 FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE t1.img01 = 'RM01-003' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 庫存量最高的 5 個物料
sql:
SELECT
    t1.img01,
    SUM(t1.img10) AS total_quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
GROUP BY

query: 找出庫存最少的 10 個料號
sql:
SELECT
    t1.img01,
    SUM(t1.img10) AS total_quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
GROUP BY
    t1.img01
ORDER BY
    total_quantity ASC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢所有採購進貨交易
sql:
SELECT * FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t4 WHERE t4.tlf19 = '採購進貨' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢 W04 倉庫的進貨記錄
sql:
SELECT t5.tlf06 AS 日期, t5.tlf19 AS 交易類型, t5.tlf13 AS 來源單號, t5.tlf07 AS 入庫數量
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t5
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t5.tlf01 = t2.img01
WHERE t2.img02 = 'W04' AND t5.tlf19 IN ('入庫', '調整')
ORDER BY t5.tlf06 DESC, t5.tlf13
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

                                                                          ^

query: 查詢 2024 年 1 月的交易記錄
sql:
SELECT * FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE strftime(t1.tlf06, '%Y-%m') = '2024-01' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 最近 30 天的進貨
sql:
SELECT t3.tlf06 AS 日期, t3.item_code AS 料號, SUM(t3.tlf10) AS 進貨數量
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/item_master/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 ON t3.item_code = t1.item_code
WHERE t3.tlf06 >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 30 DAY AND t3.tlf19 = '進貨'
GROUP BY t3.tlf06, t3.item_code
ORDER BY t3.tlf06 DESC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢所有銷貨記錄
sql:
SELECT * FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE t1.tlf19 = 'X'

LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 2024 年銷售出庫筆數
sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE strftime(t1.tlf06, '%Y') = '2024' AND t1.tlf19 = '出庫' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢完工入庫記錄
sql:
SELECT
    t1.tlf01 AS 料號,
    t1.tlf06 AS 單據日期,
    t1.tlf10 AS 異動數量,
    t1.tlf13 AS 來源單號,
    t1.tlf19 AS 交易類型,
    t1.tlf061 AS 倉庫代號
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
WHERE
    t1.tlf19 = '完工入庫'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢生產領料記錄
sql:
SELECT t6.tll01, t6.tll02, t6.tll03, t5.imd02, t4.pmm02
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tll_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t6
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t7 ON t6.tll01 = t7.tlm01
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t7.tlm04 = t2.img01
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t5 ON t2.img02 = t5.imd01
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t4 ON t6.tll04 = t4.pmm01
WHERE t6.tll02 >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 30 DAY

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0
error: 目前無交易明細資料

query: 查詢庫存報廢記錄
sql:
SELECT t2.img01, t2.img03, t2.img10
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1 ON t2.img01 = t1.ima01
WHERE t1.ima08 = '報廢'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

GROUP BY

ORDER BY
    cnt DESC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1

query: 查詢某來源單號的交易
sql:
SELECT * FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE t1.tlf13 = '您要查詢的來源單號' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢某倉庫的交易趨勢
sql:
SELECT
    strftime(t4.tlf06, '%Y-%m') AS month,
    SUM(CASE WHEN t4.tlf19 = '入' THEN t4.tlf10 ELSE -t4.tlf10 END) AS trend
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t4
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t4.tlf01 = t2.img01
WHERE
    t2.img02 = 'W01'
GROUP BY
    month
ORDER BY
    month
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0
error: Binder Error: Ambiguous reference to column name "month" (use: "t4.month" or "t2.month")

query: 按供應商統計採購單數量
sql:
SELECT
    t3.pmc01,
    COUNT(*) AS po_count
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
JOIN

GROUP BY
    t3.pmc01
ORDER BY
    po_count DESC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 按月份統計採購單數量
sql:
SELECT
    strftime(t2.pmm06, '%Y-%m') AS month,
    COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
GROUP BY
    month
ORDER BY
    month
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0
error:
Binder Error: Table "t2" does not have a column named "pmm06"

Candidate bindings: : "pmm01", "pmm02", "pmm04", "pmm09"

LINE 2:     strftime(t2.pmm06, '%Y-%m') AS month,
                     ^

query: 查詢採購單 PO-2024010001 的明細
sql:
SELECT
    t5.rvb01 AS 收料單號,
    t5.rvb05 AS 料號,
    t5.rvb07 AS 採購單號,
    t5.rvb33 AS 驗收數量
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/rvb_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t5
WHERE
    t5.rvb07 = 'PO-2024010001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的採購數量
sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t4 JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1 ON t4.pmm02 = t1.ima01 WHERE t1.ima01 = '10-0001' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢採購單 PO-2024010001 的收料記錄
sql:
SELECT
    t5.rvb01 AS 收料單號,
    t5.rvb05 AS 料號,
    t5.rvb07 AS 採購單號,
    t5.rvb33 AS 驗收數量
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/rvb_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t5
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t5.rvb07 = t2.pmm01
WHERE
    t2.pmm01 = 'PO-2024010001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的收料數量
sql:
SELECT SUM(t6.rvb33) AS total_received
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/rvb_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t6
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/t5_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t5 ON t6.rvb07 = t5.tlf13
WHERE t6.rvb05 = '10-0001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢最近 10 筆採購單
sql:
SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT
        pmn_file.*,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY pmm02 DESC) AS row_num
    FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) pmn_file
)
WHERE row_num <= 10
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3 ON t2.pmm04 = t3.pmc01
WHERE t2.pmm05 = '採購人員'

query: 查詢訂單 SO-2024010001 的明細
sql:
SELECT
    t1.tlf01 AS 料號,
    t1.tlf06 AS 單據日期,
    t1.tlf10 AS 異動數量,
    t1.tlf13 AS 來源單號,
    t1.tlf19 AS 交易類型,
    t1.tlf061 AS 倉庫代號
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
WHERE
    t1.tlf13 = 'SO-2024010001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 按客户統計訂單金額
sql:
SELECT
    pmc03 AS customer_name,
    SUM(pmm06) AS total_order_amount
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t4
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t5 ON t4.pmm04 = t5.pmc01
GROUP BY
    customer_name
ORDER BY
    total_order_amount DESC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmn_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t1.pmn01 = t2.pmm01
WHERE t2.pmm04 = '業務人員代號'
GROUP BY pmn04

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 所有料件的價格列表
sql:
SELECT
    t3.prc01 AS unit_price,
    t3.prc02 AS item_code,
    t3.prc03 AS approval_date,
    t3.prc04 AS approval_status,
    t3.prc05 AS effective_date,
    t3.prc06 AS expiration_date
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/prc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的歷史價格
sql:
SELECT
    t7.prc01,
    t7.prc02,
    t7.prc03,
    t7.prc04,
    t7.prc05,
    t7.prc06
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/prc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t7
WHERE
    t7.prc01 = '10-0001'
ORDER BY
    t7.prc03 DESC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 計算料號的平均價格
sql:
SELECT
    t7.prc01,
    AVG(t7.prc02) AS average_price
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/prc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t7
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1 ON t7.prc01 = t1.ima01
GROUP BY
    t7.prc01

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢有效期內的價格
sql:
SELECT
    t3.prc01 AS price,
    t3.prc05 AS effective_date,
    t3.prc06 AS expiration_date
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/prc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3
WHERE
    t3.prc04 = 'Approved'
    AND CAST(t3.prc05 AS DATE) <= CURRENT_DATE
    AND (t3.prc06 IS NULL OR CAST(t3.prc06 AS DATE) >= CURRENT_DATE)

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0
